subject: Baseball
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Mitchell Report (Baseball)
Amphetamines
lead_paragraph: Baseball Commissioner Bud Selig issued a statement saying that “the use of steroids and amphetamines amongst today’s players has greatly subsided and is virtually nonexistent”.
snippet: Baseball Commissioner Bud Selig issued a statement saying that “the use of steroids and amphetamines amongst today’s players has greatly subsided and is virtually nonexistent”.
